title: 3D People Network
desc: A 3D network showing how similarly people answered a survey.

title: Neural Network
desc: A visualization of a network learning to predict prime numbers.

title: People Stats
desc: Who do I know is most similar and most different?

title: Tiny Compiler
desc: Based on tinyc.c

title: Triangular Game of Life
desc: a variant of Conway's Game of Life on a triangular grid

title: 3D Function Visualizer
desc: Visualize functions in 3D

title: Lambda Calculus
desc: An educational lambda calculus interpreter.

title: Looptap
desc: My version of CoogyLoop. Click when the ball is in the arc.

title: Multicolor Particle Fluid
desc: A partical fluid simulator with more options.

title: Parser
desc: A general purpose parser that takes a grammar and input.

title: Simple Verlet Physics
desc: A quick proof of concept for a simple physics engine.

title: WebGL Particles
desc: 360,000 particles and three moving gravity wells. Simulated and rendered on the GPU.

title: Another Ray Tracer
desc: Based on smallpt by Kevin Beason

title: Bezier Screensaver
desc: Kinda fun to watch, took about an hour to make.

title: Dithering
desc: Convert images to pixel art using just a few colors.

title: Trebuchet Evolution
desc: Slowly improving trebuchets using genetic algorithm and matter.js.

title: Weather Graphs
desc: Uses location API and a weather API to create graphs from the forecast

title: Carcassonne Simulator
desc: Builds a valid Carcassonne map.

title: Isometric
desc: Experiment in making an isomorphic renderer.

title: LaserTank
desc: A clone of a game I played when I was a kid.

title: Lisp Interpreter
desc: A very basic implementation of Lisp

title: Program in HTML
desc: BUT WHY?!

title: Cutting Corners
desc: An illustration of what happens when you slowly start to cut corners. Originally described and requested by Kieran Brown.

title: First-Person Raycaster
desc: A very simple render that looks 3D but is actually just thin rectangles with different heights and shades drawn across the screen. Use arrows to move.

title: Fluid Particle Simulator
desc: Cohesive particles that interact as particles of a fluid.

title: Klisp Transpiler
desc: A transpiler written primarily in Ramda to translate Klisp (written by Kieran Brown) into JavaScript.

title: Path Finder
desc: An interactive illustration of a variant of Dijkstra's algorithm. The arrows point toward the shortest path to get the gold.

title: Ramda Transpiler
desc: A work still in progress to transpile Ramda (and a subset of JS) into plain JavaScript.

title: Sudoku Solver
desc: A simple brute-force sudoku solver. Does a depth-first search to find a solution.

title: Waveform Visualizer
desc: A simple visualizer for sound coming through your microphone.

title: Artsy Space Filler
desc: A curve fills the space and back-tracks when it hits a dead end.

title: Functional UI Micro Framework
desc: A micro framework for defining a UI using simple JavaScript objects and mainting state in a state-box.

title: Mandelbrot WebGL
desc: Interactive Mandelbrot explorer rendered using WebGL.

title: Pumpkin Slasher Game
desc: A game written for a code challenge. A Fruit Ninja knock-off.

title: React Pixel Graphic Editor
desc: A simple editor for creating pixel-graphics using React and a canvas for the UI, state maintained in the URL.

title: 2D Raymarcher
desc: A simple raymarcher in a dynamic scene.

title: 3D Raytracer with Workers
desc: Four webworkers render frames in parallel and the master thread buffers and shows them in order. No WebGL, just ImageData (makes computer very hot!)

title: Double Pendulum Visualization
desc: Each pixel represents a different double-pendulum, each starting a similar position to its neighbors. Redness indicates how far the end is from the anchor, green is y coordinate, and blue is the x coordinate.

title: Expression Builder
desc: an Angular.js component for creating SQL expressions.

title: Navier-Stokes Fluid Simulator
desc: A grid-based fluid similator.

title: Sheep Simulator
desc: A sheep simulator. After 100 sheep are born, a Velociraptor is set loose.

title: Three Color Cellular Automata Generator
desc: Each pattern is generated by a random "rule". Each cell is determined using the rule given the three cells above it.

title: Wireworld Prime Calculator
desc: I didn't invent this, I just implemented it.

title: Workspace Optimizer
desc: Uses simulated annealing to try to find optimal seating arrangements for multiple teams in an office by minimizing walking distance between each pair of teammates.

title: TSP Simulated Annealing
desc: Solves the traveling salesman problem for sets of points.

title: Traveling Salesman
desc: Finds the shortest path to visit all points and return to the start. On a real map of St. Louis.

title: Physics Builder
desc: Create and simulate contraptions using the JS port of Box2d.

title: Cohesive Particle Simulator
desc: My earliest cohesive particle simulator. Double-click to make a black hole, shift+drag it to change its strength.

title: Mandelbrot
desc: Mandelbrot explorer without WebGL.

title: 2D Raytracer
desc: Drag to draw mirrors, click to calculate lighting.

title: Jibberjabber Generator
desc: Generates text similar to the input.

title: Maze Generator
desc: Generates mazes using a depth-first space filling algorithm.

title: Snake AI
desc: A snake game with a tough AI. Can you beat it?

title: Tootsie Rocket
desc: Collect the tootsie rolls without getting dead.

title: Micro Conway's Game of Life
desc: 585 characters of HTML/JS/CSS. Click/drag to toggle cells, press space to iterate.

title: Simple Clock
desc: It's a clock.

title: Splitter
desc: Weird looking tree root things.

title: Gears
desc: Drag to create and move gears. Double-click to delete.

title: Bloxploder
desc: A game I made for fun.

title: Growing Tree
desc: It grows until it overloads the CPU. Wow.
